title: Hue lighting system
extract: It's a wireless system that allows you to control the lights in your house with a smartphone, instantly changing the look and feel of each room. The energy efficient LED bulbs connect to Wi-Fi and have the ability to emit any colour on the spectrum - 16 million to be precise. Brought to you by Philips Hue.Jun 8, 2018
